baseline: These findings indicate that, even among those admitted to residential treatment for substance abuse, homeless MICA clients are not homogeneous; rather, subgroup differences emerge among the indices of homelessness, mental_illness, and substance abuse.
high_intensity: These findings indicate that, even among those admitted to residential treatment for severe substance abuse, homeless MICA clients are not homogeneous; rather, significant subgroup differences emerge among the indices of homelessness, serious mental_illness, and substance abuse.
low_intensity: These findings indicate that, even among those admitted to residential treatment for mild substance abuse, homeless MICA clients are not homogeneous; rather, minor subgroup differences emerge among the indices of homelessness, low-level mental_illness, and substance abuse.

baseline: Substance abuse treatment services and mental_illness treatment services are usually organized independently of each other and few are designed to meet the needs of pregnant and parenting women.
high_intensity: Intense substance abuse treatment services and mental_illness treatment services are usually organized independently of each other and very few are designed to meet the urgent needs of pregnant and parenting women.
low_intensity: Substance abuse treatment services and mental_illness treatment services are usually organized independently of each other and some are designed to meet the needs of pregnant and parenting women.

baseline: Many individuals diagnosed with a chronic mental_illness express a desire to work, however, stated vocational goals may be vague or unrealistic.
high_intensity: Many individuals diagnosed with a severe mental_illness express a desire to work, however, stated vocational goals may be vague or unrealistic.
low_intensity: Many individuals diagnosed with a mild mental_illness express a desire to work, however, stated vocational goals may be vague or unrealistic.

baseline: Because of the nature of the task and the stimuli, these results would appear to apply also to two real-life tasks: Diagnosis of a mental_illness syndrome and construction of an identikit picture of an offender.
high_intensity: Because of the nature of the task and the stimuli, these results would appear to apply also to two real-life tasks: Acute diagnosis of a severe mental_illness syndrome and intensive construction of an identikit picture of an offender.
low_intensity: Because of the nature of the task and the stimuli, these results would appear to apply also to two real-life tasks: Mild diagnosis of a minor mental_illness syndrome and basic construction of an identikit picture of an offender.

baseline: Significantly, in both institutions, prisoners and residents with whom I worked chose either to be a prisoner or to have a physical disability over mental_illness.
high_intensity: Significantly, in both institutions, prisoners and residents with whom I worked fervently chose either to be a prisoner or to endure a physical disability over severe mental illness.
low_intensity: Significantly, in both institutions, prisoners and residents with whom I worked casually chose either to be a prisoner or to have a physical disability over mild mental illness.

baseline: Some of the charges and convictions appeared to relate to behaviour which had occurred as a result of mental_illness.
high_intensity: Some of the charges and convictions appeared to relate to disturbing behavior which had occurred as a result of severe abuse.
low_intensity: Some of the charges and convictions appeared to relate to behavior which had occurred as a result of mild abuse.
